pages.index: Tree Tove - Artificial Christmas Trees Manufacturing About us Reviews Gallery Order Privacy Terms Welcome to TreeTove! Your Trusted Partner in Creating Holiday Atmosphere Order Now About TreeTove At TreeTove, we are passionate about creating magical moments during the holiday season. Our journey began with a simple idea: to provide families and businesses with the highest quality artificial Christmas trees that capture the beauty and spirit of real trees without the hassle. With years of experience and a commitment to excellence, TreeTove has grown to become a trusted name in the industry. Our dedication to craftsmanship, attention to detail, and customer satisfaction sets us apart. Our Production Process At TreeTove, we are dedicated to crafting exquisite artificial Christmas trees that bring joy and cheer to homes and businesses worldwide. Our production process is a blend of precision, innovation, and sustainability, ensuring each tree meets the highest standards of quality and craftsmanship. From selecting the finest materials to employing skilled artisans and implementing rigorous quality control measures, we take pride in every step of the journey to deliver products that delight our customers year after year. Sustainable Materials Our commitment to sustainability drives us to use eco-friendly materials that minimize environmental impact without compromising on quality. Craftsmanship Our skilled artisans meticulously handcraft each tree, ensuring attention to detail and authenticity in every branch and needle. Quality Control Our stringent quality control measures guarantee that only the finest trees leave our facilities, meeting or exceeding customer expectations. Customer Reviews TreeTove's Christmas trees are absolutely stunning! They look so realistic, and I love how easy they are to set up. Highly recommended! Sarah Smith I couldn't be happier with my TreeTove tree! The quality is exceptional, and it adds the perfect festive touch to my home. Michael Johnson TreeTove's customer service is outstanding! They were incredibly helpful and made sure I got the perfect tree for my space. Emily Brown I've received so many compliments on my TreeTove tree! It's the highlight of my holiday decor. David Wilson TreeTove's trees are worth every penny! The quality is unmatched, and they last for years. Jessica Martinez I'm so impressed with the lifelike appearance of my TreeTove tree. It's hard to believe it's not real! Alexandra Davis Our Gallery Stunning Christmas Displays Explore our gallery to discover a variety of beautifully decorated Christmas trees and festive displays. Craftsmanship and Quality At TreeTove, we take pride in our craftsmanship and commitment to quality. Each artificial Christmas tree is meticulously crafted with attention to detail, ensuring a lifelike appearance and durability that lasts for years to come. Innovative Design Our team of designers constantly innovates to bring you the latest trends in artificial Christmas tree design. From traditional styles to contemporary designs, we offer a diverse range of options to suit every taste and décor. Sustainable Practices Committed to sustainability, we utilize eco-friendly materials and manufacturing processes in the production of our artificial Christmas trees. With TreeTove, you can celebrate the holiday season with peace of mind, knowing that you're making a choice that's good for the environment. Form I accept Privacy policy Contacts +91-536-1962961 treetove@gmail.com Address Kosawadi, Korba, Chhattisgarh 495683, India Schedule Daily from 10:00 to 19:00
pages.privacy: Privacy Policy - Tree Tove About us Reviews Gallery Order Privacy Terms Privacy Policy This Privacy Policy outlines our commitment to protecting the privacy of our users. It details how we collect, use, and protect your personal information and informs you about your rights under privacy legislation. Understanding and Definitions Understanding The terms defined here will have the same meaning, whether they are in the singular or plural. Definitions Account: A unique account established for you to access our service or specific parts of it. Affiliate: An entity that is under the control of, controls, or is under common control with our company, where "control" is defined as owning at least 50% of the voting shares, shares, or other securities eligible for the election of directors or other managerial authority. Company: Refers to TreeTove. Device: Any device capable of accessing the service, such as a smartphone, computer, or digital tablet. Personal Data: Any data about an individual that can be identified from that data (or from that and other information in our possession or likely to come into our possession). Service: The website operated by TreeTove. Service Provider: Any individual or company that processes data on behalf of TreeTove. This includes third-party companies or individuals contracted by the company to facilitate the service, provide the service on behalf of the company, perform services related to the service, or assist the company in analyzing how the service is used. Usage Data: Data collected automatically, generated by the use of the service or from the service's infrastructure itself (for example, the duration of a page visit). You: The person accessing or using the service, or the company, or other legal entity on behalf of which such person is accessing or using the service, as applicable. Protection of Children's Privacy Our Service is not intended for individuals under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect identifiable information from children under 13 years of age. If you are a parent or guardian and become aware that your child has provided us with Personal Data, please contact us. If we discover that we have collected Personal Data from children without parental consent verification, we take steps to remove that information from our servers. If we need to collect information from children under 13 years of age, we will do so only with parental consent or as permitted by law. External Links on Our Service Our Service may include links to external websites not operated by us. If you click on a third-party link, you will be directed to that third party's website. We strongly advise you to review the Privacy Policy of every site you visit. We have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party websites or services. Amendments to This Privacy Policy We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. Prior to the change becoming effective, we will notify you by email and/or a prominent notice on our Service, and update the "Last updated" date at the top of this Privacy Policy. We encourage you to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. Changes to this Privacy Policy are effective when they are posted on this page. Contacting Us If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please contact us: By email: treetove@gmail.com Contacts +91-536-1962961 treetove@gmail.com Address Kosawadi, Korba, Chhattisgarh 495683, India Schedule Daily from 10:00 to 19:00
pages.terms: Terms of Use - Tree Tove About us Reviews Gallery Order Privacy Terms Terms and Conditions We urge you to carefully read these terms and conditions before engaging with our services. Clarifications and Definitions Clarifications The capitalized terms used herein are defined under certain conditions and shall retain their meanings ascribed, whether used in the singular or plural. Definitions Affiliate: Refers to any entity exercising control over, controlled by, or commonly controlled with a party, where "control" encompasses owning 50% or more of the voting rights, equity or other securities influencing the election of management. Company: This term refers to HeadlightsShiny, the entity behind the service. Device: Encompasses any mechanism enabling access to the service, including but not limited to computers, smartphones, and tablets. Service: This term is used in reference to the website provided by the Company. You: Identifies any individual or entity using or accessing the service, personally or on behalf of another legal entity. Acknowledgement These terms and conditions form the basis of the agreement between you and the company, outlining the legal rights and obligations of all parties regarding the use of the service. Your use of the service is conditioned upon your acceptance and adherence to these terms. They are applicable to all users, visitors, and others who access or use the service. By engaging with the service, you agree to be bound by these terms. If you find any part of these terms unacceptable, it is advised not to use the service. You affirm that you are at least 18 years old. The company explicitly prohibits the use of the service by individuals under 18 years of age. Your use of the service is also conditioned upon your acceptance of the company's privacy policy, which should be carefully reviewed before engagement. External Links Our service may feature links to external websites or services not operated by us. These links are provided for convenience and do not signify endorsement. We are not responsible for the content, policies, or practices of any third-party websites or services. It is your responsibility to review the privacy policies and terms of any sites you visit. Termination of Service We reserve the right to terminate or suspend access to our service immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any breach of these terms. If your right to use the service is terminated, it shall cease immediately. Limitation of Liability In no event shall the company or its suppliers be liable for any incidental, indirect, special, punitive, or consequential damages arising out of or in connection with your use of the service, whether such damages are foreseeable. The aggregate liability of the company and its suppliers under these terms is limited to the greater of the amount you paid to the company for access and use of the service, or 100 USD if no purchase was made through the service. Provided Service "AS IS" The service is provided on an "AS IS" and "AS AVAILABLE" basis, without warranties of any kind, express or implied. The company disclaims all warranties, including but not limited to, implied warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, and non-infringement. The company does not warrant that the service will function uninterrupted, be secure, or be available at any particular time or location. Applicable Law The laws of the country, excluding its conflict of law rules, govern these terms and your use of the service. Your use of the app may also subject you to other local, state, national, or international laws. Dispute Resolution If you have disputes or concerns regarding the service, we encourage contacting the company directly to seek resolution. Severability & Waiver Severability If any provision of these terms is deemed unenforceable or invalid, such provision shall be modified to achieve the original intent as closely as possible, and the remaining provisions shall remain in effect. Waiver Failure to enforce any right or provision of these terms shall not be considered a waiver of those rights. Modification of Terms We reserve the right to modify these terms at our discretion. You will be notified of any significant changes in advance, and by continuing to use the service, you accept the revised terms. Contacting Us If you have any questions about these terms, please contact us directly.
